title: 18 Toughest Holes on the PGA Tour
headline: The 18 Toughest Holes on the PGA Tour in 2013-14
description: Every course has a somewhat easy hole, right? Not these. They're the 18 most difficult holes on the PGA Tour for the 2013-14 season, like No. 11 at Augusta National. Be glad you don’t have to play them all at once.
short_headline: The 18 Toughest Holes on the PGA Tour in 2013-14
page_title: 18 Toughest Holes on the PGA Tour
slug: The 18 Toughest Holes on the PGA Tour in 2013-14
body: Every course has a somewhat easy hole, right? Not these. They're the 18 most difficult holes on the PGA Tour for the 2013-14 season, like No. 11 at Augusta National. Be glad you don’t have to play them all at once.
